barter.name: Barter
barter.text: Trade a card in your hand for a random card in your opponent's hand.

brynjolf.name: Brynjolf
brynjolf.text: Drain. When a friendly creature Pilfers or Drains, gain +1 magicka this turn.

caravanenforcer.name: Caravan Enforcer
caravanenforcer.text: When Caravan Enforcer moves, he gains +1/+1.

deepwoodtrapper.name: Deepwood Trapper
deepwoodtrapper.text: Guard. Shackle creatures damaged by Deepwood Trapper.

dovahofthevoice.name: Dovah of the Voice
dovahofthevoice.text: Last Gasp: Put a random Shout into your hand.

dovahofthevoice.name: Dovah of the Voice
dovahofthevoice.text: Last Gasp: Put a random Shout into your hand.

eldergleammatron.name: Eldergleam Matron
eldergleammatron.text: Summon: Put a random Animal into your hand.

embassydisguise.name: Embassy Disguise
embassydisguise.text: +0/+1. Summon: Draw a card. The weilder has Cover until it attacks.

gloomlurker.name: Gloomlurker
gloomlurker.text: Prophecy. Summon: Give a creature Cover.

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.text: Either put another Lockpick into your hand or draw a card and reduce its costs by 2. Choosen randomly.

moveinshadows.name: Move in Shadows
moveinshadows.text: Move a friendly creature. It moves again at the end of the turn.

nightprowler.name: Nightprowler
nightprowler.text: When Nightprowler gains Cover, draw a card.

palaceprowler.name: Palace Prowler
palaceprowler.text: Drain. Pilfer: Gain 1 magicka this turn.

ringofnamira.name: Ring of Namira
ringofnamira.text: Ongoing. When you gain health, deal that much damage to your opponent.

serpentinestalker.name: Serpentine Stalker
serpentinestalker.text: Slay: +2/+0. May move to attack creatures in the other lane.

shadowgreenelder.name: Shadowgreen Elder
shadowgreenelder.text: Summon: Give other friendly Spriggans and Animals +2/+2.

shadowmaster.name: Shadowmaster
shadowmaster.text: Summon: Give a friendly creature Cover. Your opponent can't target it with actions until next turn.

shadowscalepartisan.name: Shadowscale Partisan
shadowscalepartisan.text: Lethal. Summon: +0/+2 if you have another creature with Lethal.

shearpointdragon.name: Shearpoint Dragon
shearpointdragon.text: Summon: Give a creature -2/-2. When you reduce a creature power or health with another effect, reduce it by an extra 1.

sightlessskulk.name: Sightless Skulk
sightlessskulk.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (Agility) creatures.

swimsatnight.name: Swims-at-Night
swimsatnight.text: Summon: Put a random 0-cost card into your hand. After you play a 0-cost card. Swims-at-Night gains +1/+1.

thievesguildfence.name: Thieves Guild Fence
thievesguildfence.text: When you draw a card on your turn, reduce its cost by 1.

woodlandlookout.name: Woodland Lookout
woodlandlookout.text: When you summon a Dragon, gain 4 health.

ancientlookout.name: Ancient Lookout
ancientlookout.text: When you summon a Dragon, summon a 1/1 Draugr Sentry with Guard.

corruptedshade.name: Corrupted Shade
corruptedshade.text: Ward. At the end of your turn, if Corrupted Shade doesn't have Ward, sacrifice it.

dragoncultghost.name: Dragon Cult Ghost
dragoncultghost.text: Spend all your available magicka to play Dragon Cult Ghost, its power and health are equals to the magicka spent.

dragonplatearmor.name: Dragonplate Armor
dragonplatearmor.text: +2/+2. Summon: +2/+2 if you have a Dragon in your discard pile.

eastempirecrafter.name: East Empire Crafter
eastempirecrafter.text: When you summon another creature with 5 health or more, give it +1/+1 and Guard.

emperortitusmedeii.name: Emperor Titus Mede II
emperortitusmedeii.text: At the end of your turn, give the top creature of your deck +1/+1 and Guard.

encumberedexplorer.name: Encumbered Explorer
encumberedexplorer.text: Shackle Encumbered Explorer after he attacks.

frostgiant.name: Frost Giant
frostgiant.text: Regenerate. When Frost Giant heals, you gains that much health.

frosttroll.name: Frost Troll
frosttroll.text: Regenerate. When Frost Troll take damage, it gains that much power.

highhrothgar.name: High Hrothgar
highhrothgar.text: Ongoing. When you summon a creature, its power becomes equals to its health.

innkeeperdelphine.name: Innkeeper Delphine
innkeeperdelphine.text: After you play a Dragon or Schout, Innkeeper Delphine changes into Grandmaster Delphine.

laydownarms.name: Lay Down Arms
laydownarms.text: Set a creature's power and health to 1.

mentorofthewatch.name: Mentor of the Watch
mentorofthewatch.text: Prophecy, Guard. Summon: Give a creature in your hand Guard.

skeletaldragon.name: Skeletal Dragon
skeletaldragon.text: Guard, Summon: Give all creaturesin your discard pile +2/+2. Last Gasp: Draw a random creature from your discard pile.

soultear.name: Soultear
soultear.text: Draw a creature from your discard pile.

stonehillmammoth.name: Stonehill Mammoth
stonehillmammoth.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (Endurance) creatures.

wavesofthefallen.name: Waves of the Fallen
wavesofthefallen.text: Transform all enemy creatures in a lane into 2/2 Stricken Draugr or transform all friendly creatures in a lane into 5/5 Hulking Draugrs.

arcano.name: Arcano
arcano.text: Breakthrough. Summon: Deal 5 damage. Your actions have Breakthrough.

arcaneenchanter.name: Arcane Enchanter
arcaneenchanter.text: Ongoing. When you draw an item, give it a random Keyword.

bringerofnightmares.name: Bringer of Nightmares
bringerofnightmares.text: Summon: See a vision of a random creature, then you must choose a creature to transform into it.

collegeofwinterhold.name: College of Winterhold
collegeofwinterhold.text: Activate: Reveals three random 1-cost actions and draw one. Then, increase the cost of cards this reveals by 1.

conjurationscholar.name: Conjuration Scholar
conjurationscholar.text: Summon: Summon a 5/5 Frost Atronach with Guard.

courtwizard.name: Court Wizard
courtwizard.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (Intelligence) creatures.

darkrebirth.name: Dark Rebirth
darkrebirth.text: Sacrifice a creature to summon a copy of it.

dragonpriestmask.name: Dragon Priest Mask
dragonpriestmask.text: +2/+2 Summon: Trigger the wielder's summon ability.

dragonsfury.name: Dragon's Fury
dragonsfury.text: Deal 3 damage to a creature, and 3 extra damage for each friendly Dragon.

echoofakatosh.name: Echo of Akatosh
echoofakatosh.text: Summon: Give each creature in your deck a random Keyword.

ghostsealookout.name: Ghost Sea Lookout
ghostsealookout.text: When you summon a Dragon, Ghost Sea Lookout gains a Ward.

insightfulscholar.name: Insightful Scholar
insightfulscholar.text: Prophecy, Summon: Draw a card for each card your opponent drew this turn.

jzargo.name: J'zargo
jzargo.text: Summon: Put an Experimental Scroll into your hand.

masterswordsmith.name: Master Swordsmith
masterswordsmith.text: At the start of your turn, give each item in your deck +1/+1.

mistveilenchanter.name: mistveilenchanter
mistveilenchanter.text: Ward. Summon: +2/+0 if you have another creature with Ward.

revealingtheunseen.name: Revealing the Unseen
revealingtheunseen.text: Put two random actions into your hand.

riftenpickpocket.name: Riften Pickpocket
riftenpickpocket.text: Summon: Reveal three random cards in your opponent's deck. Choose one and draw a copy of it.

studiousgreybeard.name: Studious Greybeard
studiousgreybeard.text: At the start of your turn, look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it.

thalmorembassy.name: Thalmor Embassy
thalmorembassy.text: Ongoing. Your High Elves cost 1 less. You can't be damaged by actions.

thiefofdreams.name: Thief of Dreams
thiefofdreams.text: Summon: See a vision of two of your opponent's cards. Guess which one is in their hand. If you're right, draw a copy of it.

alduin.name: Alduin
alduin.text: Costs 2 less for each Dragon in your discard pile. Summon: Destroy all other creatures. At the start of your turn, summon a random Dragon from your discard pile.

anighttoremember.name: A Night to Remember
anighttoremember.text: A friendly creature disappears to who knows where, then returns in the other lane Shackled.

barbas.name: Barbas
barbas.text: Summon: Choose one: Slay: Gains +1/+1 and Guard. Fetch: Put a dandom Daedra into your hand. Roll Over: Gains Charge.

dragonmound.name: Dragon Mound
dragonmound.text: Ongoint. Summon: Transform all cards in your deck into random Dragons. Your Dragons cost 1 less.

dwarvendynamo.name: Dwarven Dynamo
dwarvendynamo.text: Summon: Give another (Neutral) creature +3/+3 and Guard.

forswornlooter.name: Forsworn Looter
forswornlooter.text: Pilfer: Draw a random item from your deck with cost equal to Forsworn Looter's power.

greybeardmentor.name: Greybeard Mentor
greybeardmentor.text: Summon: Draw a random Shout from your deck.

journeytosovngarde.name: Journey to Sovngarde
journeytosovngarde.text: Shuffle all creatures from your discard pile into your deck. Give them +5/+5 and reduce their costs by 5.

lute.name: Lute
lute.text: +1/+2. The wielder is immune to Silence.

midnightsnack.name: Midnight Snack
midnightsnack.text: Prophecy, Guard. Last Gasp: Reduce the cost of a random Dragon in your hand by 1.

mudcarbanklesnapper.text: Summon: Deal 1 damage to your opponent.

paarthurnax.name: Paarthurnax
paarthurnax.text: Summon: put three random Shouts into your hand and reduce their costs to 0.

prizedchicken.name: Prized Chicken
prizedchicken.text: Last Gasp: Fill this lane with 1/1 Angry Villagers.

raginghorker.name: Raging Horker
raginghorker.text: When Raging Horker takes damage, it gains +1/+1.

wordwall.name: Word Wall
wordwall.text: Guard. Summon: Upgrade a Shout in your hand.

youngdragonborn.name: Young Dragonborn
youngdragonborn.text: When Young Dragonborn Slay a Dragon, put a random Shout into your hand. After you play a Shout, Young Dragonborn gains +1/+1.

aelashuntmate.name: Aela's Huntmate
aelashuntmate.text: Beast Form: +1/+1 and draw a card.

battlefieldscrounger.name: Battlefield Scrounger
battlefieldscrounger.text: Charge. Slay: Put a random item into your hand.

berserkerofthepale.name: Berserker of the Pale
berserkerofthepale.text: When you summon another creature with 5 power or more, give it +1/+1 and Breakthrough.

bladeslookout.name: Blades Lookout
bladeslookout.text: When you summon a Dragon, draw a card.

duelatoptheworld.name: Duel Atop the World
duelatoptheworld.text: Give a friendly creature +3/+3. It Battles your opponent's most powerful creature.

hitandrun.name: Hit and Run
hitandrun.text: Draw five cards. discard your hand at the end of the turn.

inspiringstormcloak.name: Inspiring Stormcloak
inspiringstormcloak.text: Last Gasp: Summon a 2/2 Rallying Stormcloak in each lane.

shieldbreaker.name: Shield Breaker
shieldbreaker.text: +2/+2. Summon: An enemy creature loses Guard.

skyforge.name: Skyforge
skyforge.text: Uses 3. Activate: Equip a friendly creature with a Steel Dagger. If Skyforge has equipped 3 daggers, it changes into Underforge.

stormcloakavenger.name: Stormcloak Avenger
stormcloakavenger.text: At the end of your turn, if three or more friendly creatures died this turn, summon a 2/2 Rallying Stormcloak.

stormcloakcamp.name: Stormcloak Camp
stormcloakcamp.text: Ongoing. At the end of your turn, if a creature died this turn, deal 2 damage to your opponent.

stormcloakvanguard.name: Stormcloak Vanguard
stormcloakvanguard.text: Charge. Last Gasp: Put a 5/5 Stormcloak Battalion in your hand.

strongholdpatrol.name: Stronghold Patrol
strongholdpatrol.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (Strength) creatures.

ulfricstormcloak.name: Ulfric Stormcloak
ulfricstormcloak.text: When you play a Shout, draw a random Nord from your deck.

ulfricszealot.name: Ulfric's Zealot
ulfricszealot.text: Last Gasp: Put a Heavy Battleaxe into your hand.

unrelentingforce.name: Unrelenting Force
unrelentingforce.text: Shout - Level 1. Unsummon an enemy creature with power 3 or less

wildfiredragon.name: Wildfire Dragon
wildfiredragon.text: Breakthrough. Summon: Deal 1 damage to all other creatures. Slay: +1/+1

worldeaterseyrie.name: World Eater's Eyrie
worldeaterseyrie.text: Ongoing. When you summon a creature that costs 7 or more, double its power and health.

alanddivided.name: A Land Divided
alanddivided.text: Fill the left lane with Stormcloak Aggressors or the right lane with Colovian Troopers.

arrest.name: Arrest
arrest.text: Steal an enemy creature. It loses Guard, and is permanently Shackled.

banditringleader.name: Bandit Ringleader
banditringleader.text: Summon: Other friendly creatures in this lane have 'Pilfer: Draw a card' this turn.

cauldronkeeper.name: Cauldron Keeper
cauldronkeeper.text: Guard. Summon: Give yout Activated supports an extra use. You may Activate your supports an extra time each turn.

cliffsidelookout.name: Cliffside Lookout
cliffsidelookout.text: When you summon a Dragon, Cliffside Lookout gains +1/+1.

devour.name: Devour
devour.text: Destroy a creature with 4 power of less and give its Keywords to a random Dragon in your hand.

grislygourmet.name: Grisly Gourmet
grislygourmet.text: Summon: Transform an enemy creature with 2 power or less into a Sweet Roll.

imperialcamp.name: Imperial Camp
imperialcamp.text: Ongoing. Summon: Put a 1/2 Septim Guardsman into your hand. friendly Guards have +1/+0.

jarlbalgruuf.name: Jarl Balgruuf
jarlbalgruuf.text: Summon: Summon a Stormcloak Skirmisher in the left lane and a Colovian Trooper in the rigth lane. At start of your turn, if your lanes are full, you win the game.

karthspirescourge.name: Karthspire Scourge
karthspirescourge.text: Summon: Give all enemy creatures in this lane -1/-0.

legaterikke.name: Legate Rikke
legaterikke.text: When you summon an imperial, summon a 1/1 Imperial Grunt in the other lane.

praetoriancommander.name: Praetorian Commander
praetoriancommander.text: Summon: Give creatures in your deck +2/+2.

priestoftheeight.name: Priest of the Eight
priestoftheeight.text: Summon: Draw a card if you have two other (Willpower) creatures.

snowhawkdetachment.name: Snowhawk Detachment
snowhawkdetachment.text: Guard. Summon: +1/+1 if you have another creature with Guard.

thalmorjusticiar.name: Thalmor Justiciar
thalmorjusticiar.text: After you play an action, summon a 1/1 Thalmor Soldier.

thievesguildshadowfoot.name: Thieves Guild Shadowfoot
thievesguildshadowfoot.text: Summon: Steal the top card of the opponent's deck and replace it with a Counterfeit Trinket.

undyingdragon.name: Undying Dragon
undyingdragon.text: Drain. +5/+5 while you have 30 or more health.

winterholdillusionist.name: Winterhold Illusionist
winterholdillusionist.text: Summon: Another creature disappears, then returns at the end of the turn.

wolfcage.name: Wolf Cage
wolfcage.text: Uses 3. Activate. Summon an Uncaged Wolf

archersgambit.name: Archer's Gambit
archersgambit.text: Move a friendly creature. Then, it deals 1 damage.

assassinsritual.name: Assassin's Ritual
assassinsritual.text: Give a creature Lethal and Ward.

battlemagesonslaught.name: Battlemage's Onslaught
battlemagesonslaught.text: Put a random action, item, and creature into your hand.

crusadersassault.name: Crusader's Assault
crusadersassault.text: Give a creature +2/+0, Breakthrough and 'Slay and Pilfer: Draw a card' this turn

magestrick.name: Mage's Trick
magestrick.text: Deal 1 damage, gain 1 health, and draw 1 card.

monksstrike.name: Monk's Strike
monksstrike.text: Move a friendly creature and give it +3/+0 and Drain this turn.

scoutsreport.name: Scout's Report
scoutsreport.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard it. Draw a card.

sorcerersnegation.name: Sorcerer's Negation
sorcerersnegation.text: Silence a creature, then deal 2 damage to it.

spellswordssummoning.text: Summon a random 1-cost creature in each lane.

warriorsfury.name: warriorsfury
warriorsfury.text: Give a random creature and item in your hand +2/+2.
